long_description: A cutting-edge bow lock that spans both wheels on most road bikes, the extra-wide, extra-secure 1.25 in. TiGr Lock Titanium lock offers incredible toughness in a streamlined and featherlight design. Unobtrusive design attaches to the top tube when you're on the move, and clear PVC sleeve protects your frame from scratches. Silicon O-rings act as bumpers between the lock bow and bike frame for added scratch protection while the bow is strapped to the bike for transit. TiGr Lock Titanium lock includes a stainless-steel lock cylinder with 2 keys, titanium bow with PVC coating, a pair of mounting straps, silicon O-rings and user manual.
short_description: A cutting-edge bow lock that spans both wheels on most road bikes, the extra-wide, extra-secure 1.25 in. TiGr Lock Titanium lock offers incredible toughness in a streamlined and featherlight design.
